content:
In every cell, pulling ever closer
Whispering, “Come, and feel Nirvana
Drown your sorrows and worries in me
Look at me, I’m gray with your sadness
I’m green with the life eternal of your soul
Talk to me, tell me all, every little detail
I will be your silent ever-present listener
I will dissolve all your pain in my waters
I will cradle you in cool gentle sways
Dust is but just dust, it is nothing
I am that which holds you together
Hear our hearts beat together, my child!
Come, come into me and be at peace.”
Enraptured, I walk a few steps in, hoping,
Allowing myself to be held, comforted
And for today, for now, I am at peace
